message: Let's split the money 60/40.  I believe this is a fair offer to start with.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fair, considering I'm the one making the offer this round. Let's call it even.
Bob, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split.  Remember, the longer this goes, the less your share is worth due to inflation.
